Apps-network-graph

Data visualization for networks

View on GitHub

Radial

The graph shows the dependencies between departments. Dependencies are bundled according inbound and outbound requests. This example offers three granularities views (depts, apps and scopes) as well the items department use case.

  • Depts Graph
  • Apps Graph
  • Scope Graph
  • Items Graph

It is highly recommended view all graphs with last Google Chrome version.

Apps-network-graph is maintained by pablomolnar
